reviewText: My 4 year old is obsessed with trains. This was a Christmas gift and could not wait to watch it. He absolutely loves it, plus he learns new things about trains,  each time he watches it.
My 5 year old son loves this movie

My son loves trains and this is now one of his favorite DVDs. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it contains 3 DVDs for the price. There was a Christmas DVD about trains and a DVD on jet planes. He loves them all but the train engineer DVD is a real favorite and very informative for any adult who ends up watching it with their kids.
